notice.message: A second beta-test (prerelease) version of Mesquite 4 is available, with some new features and bug fixes. It also has bundled in the Zephyr, Chromaseq, and Cartographer packages. Check out the details at here.

A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.6, with various new features and bug fixes, an offline manual and a new location for the website. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here
